CustomField.description: Sales Leader view of opportunity value. SDS-2737: Updated the field name from 'SL Tesla Amount' to 'SL DC GPU Amount'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sales Leaders, this is a view of the total opportunity amount. Used to either communicate potential upside or downside. This is not required if you are aligned with the opportunity dollar value.
CustomField.label: SL DC GPU Amount
